description: Access & manage your account.  Browse the Internet.  Account info. You can manage your wireless service by selecting “Account info” and following the links provided. As a monthly rate plan client, you can:  1) Check your account balance and bill date.  2) Check recent payment information.  3) View your rate plan, features and promotions.  4) Check your voice & data usage, up to the last 2 hours.  5) Make a one-time credit card payment.  6) Add a feature.  7) View our latest offers, products, services & FAQs.   As a prepaid client, you can:  1) Check your account balance and expiry date.  2) View your rate plan, features and promotions.  3) Top up your balance with a Prepaid card.  4) Top up your balance with a one-time credit card payment.  5) Add a feature.  6) View our latest offers, products, services & FAQs.   Internet Your gateway to the Internet on your phone. Get news, sports, weather and entertainment updates, check your horoscope, find movie listings, and lots more.
